channel.title: RuneMTP 634 help
channel.description:
When I go to start up Marcbob's RuneMTP 634, this shows up:
[code][PacketManager] Loading packet handlers... [PacketManager] Loaded 46 packet handlers. [ClanManager] Loading clans.... [RS2Server] Loaded cache. [ClanManager] Loaded 45 clans. [AreaManager] Loading areas... com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.StreamException: : Connection timed out: connect at com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.DomDriver.createReader(DomDriver.java :88) at com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.DomDriver.createReader(DomDriver.java :70) at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.fromXML(XStream.java:845) at org.dementhium.io.XMLHandler.fromXML(XMLHandler.java:62) at org.dementhium.content.areas.AreaManager.<init>(AreaManager.java:20) at org.dementhium.model.World.<init>(World.java:98) at org.dementhium.model.World.<clinit>(World.java:68) at org.dementhium.RS2Server.main(RS2Server.java:46) Caused by: java.net.ConnectException: Connection timed out: connect at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.doConnect(PlainSocketImpl.java:333) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(PlainSocketImpl.java:195) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(PlainSocketImpl.java:182) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(SocksSocketImpl.java:366) at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:525) at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:475) at sun.net.NetworkClient.doConnect(NetworkClient.java:163) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(HttpClient.java:394) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(HttpClient.java:529) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.<init>(HttpClient.java:233) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(HttpClient.java:306) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(HttpClient.java:323) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getNewHttpClient(HttpURLC onnection.java:860) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(HttpURLConne ction.java:801) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.connect(HttpURLConnection .java:726) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(HttpURLCon nection.java:1049) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLEntityManager.setupCurrent Entity(XMLEntityManager.java:677) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLEntityManager.startEntity( XMLEntityManager.java:1315) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLEntityManager.startDTDEnti ty(XMLEntityManager.java:1282) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLDTDScannerImpl.setInputSou rce(XMLDTDScannerImpl.java:283) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLDocumentScannerImpl$DTDDri ver.dispatch(XMLDocumentScannerImpl.java:1194) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLDocumentScannerImpl$DTDDri ver.next(XMLDocumentScannerImpl.java:1090) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLDocumentScannerImpl$Prolog Driver.next(XMLDocumentScannerImpl.java:1003) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLDocumentScannerImpl.next(X MLDocumentScannerImpl.java:648) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.impl.XMLDocumentFragmentScannerImp l.scanDocument(XMLDocumentFragmentScannerImpl.java:511) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.parsers.XML11Configuration.parse(X ML11Configuration.java:808) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.parsers.XML11Configuration.parse(X ML11Configuration.java:737) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.parsers.XMLParser.parse(XMLParser. java:119) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.parsers.DOMParser.parse(DOMParser. java:235) at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.jaxp.DocumentBuilderImpl.parse(Doc umentBuilderImpl.java:284) at com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.DomDriver.createReader(DomDriver.java :79) ... 7 more Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError at org.dementhium.RS2Server.main(RS2Server.java:46) Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException at org.dementhium.content.areas.AreaManager.<init>(AreaManager.java:24) at org.dementhium.model.World.<init>(World.java:98) at org.dementhium.model.World.<clinit>(World.java:68) ... 1 more[/code]
I haven't added anything recently...

item.title: RuneMTP 634 help
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:3, topic:417422”]CONNECTION TIMED OUT. DEERRRRRRRRP

Imsuperman05: Did you try compiling then running it?
Fridder: Of course I did you retard.[/quote]

Why does the connection time out?

Read full topic
